commands.name: az iot ops schema create
commands.summary: Create a schema within a schema registry.
commands.syntax:
az iot ops schema create --format {delta, json}
                         --name
                         --registry
                         --resource-group
                         --type {message}
                         --vc
                         [--desc]
                         [--display-name]
                         [--vd]
                         [--ver]
examples: az iot ops schema create -n myschema -g myresourcegroup --registry myregistry --format json --type message --version-content myschema.json

az iot ops schema create -n myschema -g myresourcegroup --registry myregistry --format delta --type message --desc "Schema for Assets" --display-name myassetschema --version-content '{"hello": "world"}' --ver 14 --vd "14th version"

commands.name: az iot ops schema delete
commands.summary: Delete a target schema within a schema registry.
commands.syntax:
az iot ops schema delete --name
                         --registry
                         --resource-group
                         [--yes {false, true}]
examples: az iot ops schema delete --name myschema --registry myregistry -g myresourcegroup

commands.name: az iot ops schema list
commands.summary: List schemas within a schema registry.
examples: az iot ops schema list -g myresourcegroup --registry myregistry

commands.name: az iot ops schema show
commands.summary: Show details of a schema within a schema registry.
examples: az iot ops schema show --name myschema --registry myregistry -g myresourcegroup

commands.name: az iot ops schema show-dataflow-refs
commands.summary: Show the schema references used for dataflows.
commands.syntax:
az iot ops schema show-dataflow-refs --registry
                                     --resource-group
                                     [--latest {false, true}]
                                     [--schema]
                                     [--ver]
examples: az iot ops schema show-dataflow-refs --version 1 --schema myschema --registry myregistry -g myresourcegroup
az iot ops schema show-dataflow-refs --schema myschema --registry myregistry -g myresourcegroup
az iot ops schema show-dataflow-refs --registry myregistry -g myresourcegroup
az iot ops schema show-dataflow-refs --registry myregistry -g myresourcegroup --latest
